00007 #include "InterruptableSensorBase.h"
00008 #include "Utility.h"

00010 InterruptableSensorBase::InterruptableSensorBase()
00011 {
00012     m_manager = NULL;
00013     m_interrupt = NULL;
00014 }
00015 
00016 InterruptableSensorBase::~InterruptableSensorBase()
00017 {
00018 
00019 }
00020 
00021 void InterruptableSensorBase::AllocateInterrupts(bool watcher)
00022 {
00023     wpi_assert(m_interrupt == NULL);
00024     wpi_assert(m_manager == NULL);
00025     // Expects the calling leaf class to allocate an interrupt index.
00026     m_interrupt = new tInterrupt(m_interruptIndex, &status);
00027     m_interrupt->writeConfig_WaitForAck(false, &status);
00028     m_manager = new tInterruptManager(1 << m_interruptIndex, watcher, &status);
00029 }
00030 
00035 void InterruptableSensorBase::CancelInterrupts()
00036 {
00037     wpi_assert(m_manager != NULL);
00038     wpi_assert(m_interrupt != NULL);
00039     delete m_interrupt;
00040     delete m_manager;
00041     m_interrupt = NULL;
00042     m_manager = NULL;
00043 }
00044 
00049 void InterruptableSensorBase::WaitForInterrupt(float timeout)
00050 {
00051     wpi_assert(m_manager != NULL);
00052     wpi_assert(m_interrupt != NULL);
00053     m_manager->watch((INT32)(timeout * 1e3), &status);
00054     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00055 }
00056 
00062 void InterruptableSensorBase::EnableInterrupts()
00063 {
00064     wpi_assert(m_manager != NULL);
00065     wpi_assert(m_interrupt != NULL);
00066     m_manager->enable(&status);
00067     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00068 }
00069 
00073 void InterruptableSensorBase::DisableInterrupts()
00074 {
00075     wpi_assert(m_manager != NULL);
00076     wpi_assert(m_interrupt != NULL);
00077     m_manager->disable(&status);
00078     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00079 }
00080 
00086 double InterruptableSensorBase::ReadInterruptTimestamp()
00087 {
00088     wpi_assert(m_interrupt != NULL);
00089     return m_interrupt->readTimeStamp(&status) * 1e-6;
00090 }
